resources.string: Please contact your IT support. Backend version is outdated and doesn’t support multiple wounds measurement feature.
Enable or disable full keyboard for Barcodes Manual Input
The best way to use imitoWound. It\'s fast and accurate.
Our calibration marker stickers are for single use and packed in small boxes that fits in your pocket. Your hospital can order them directly from imito AG
As alternative, you can use a ruler or any other physical object with known size. In this case, you will need to manually calibrate photo each time you make a measurement.
Check out short tutorial video to see how it works.

It\'s not possible to archive this series, because the patient has no open visits. Please contact your IT support.
